review_title: Got a raise a few weeks prior and then without any warning/discussion COO decided overnight to let me go
years_at_company: Got a raise a few weeks prior and then without any warning/discussion COO decided overnight to let me go
pros: Great product and overall the team is friendly and fun
cons:
COO decided overnight that my skill set was what it was and let me go. No one in the company ever said anything negative about my performance. I consistently hit the goals they asked of me and frequently praised my performance publically.

Leadership can change their minds overnight and what they say goes no matter what
advice_to_mgmt: Have discussions with employees if something isn't going how you planned before just firing them.
